main_definition: Tablets can refer to various meanings including medication in the form of solid doses, portable computing devices, or flat-shaped stones used as writing surfaces.

meanings_and_examples.example: She takes two aspirin tablets every day to help with her headache.
He uses a Galaxy Tab for reading eBooks and watching movies on the go.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Flat stones used as writing surfaces
meanings_and_examples.example: In ancient times, tablets were often made of clay or stone to write cuneiform script.
